name: Barbarian
summary: A fierce warrior whose fury fuels relentless assaults.
description: Barbarians are warriors who can enter a battle rage, pushing themselves beyond their normal limitations to deliver crushing blows and shrug off damage.

name: Bard
summary: A performer who weaves music and lore into potent magic.
description: Bards travel the world telling stories, recording history, and casting spells inspired by music and lore. Their talents bolster allies and befuddle foes.

name: Cleric
summary: A divine spellcaster who channels the power of the gods.
description: Clerics are intermediaries between the mortal world and the distant planes of the gods. They wield divine magic to heal, protect, and smite.

name: Druid
summary: A guardian of nature wielding primal spells and wild shapes.
description: Druids call upon the spirits of nature and can assume animal forms. They defend the natural order through primal magic and kinship with beasts.

name: Fighter
summary: A master of martial combat skilled with a variety of weapons.
description: Fighters focus on weapon mastery and battlefield tactics. Their combat training provides versatility and resilience in any skirmish.

name: Monk
summary: A disciplined martial artist who channels inner ki energy.
description: Monks are ascetic warriors whose rigorous training harnesses the magic of ki. They excel at mobility, precise strikes, and deflecting blows.

name: Paladin
summary: A holy champion bound by oath who blends combat and divine power.
description: Paladins swear sacred oaths to uphold justice and righteousness. Their devotion grants them divine magic, protective auras, and healing hands.

name: Ranger
summary: A skilled hunter and tracker adept at surviving the wilds.
description: Rangers are warriors of the wilderness. They master survival techniques, favored enemies, and spells tied to nature and exploration.

name: Rogue
summary: A deft infiltrator relying on agility, stealth, and precision.
description: Rogues are quick, skillful, and cunning. They excel at infiltration, trap disarming, and devastating sneak attacks.

name: Sorcerer
summary: An innate spellcaster whose magic comes from a powerful origin.
description: Sorcerers command raw arcane power that flows from a bloodline or otherworldly influence. Their spellcasting is intuitive and flexible.

name: Warlock
summary: A wielder of eldritch power bound to a mysterious patron.
description: Warlocks forge pacts with patronsâ€”beings of fey, fiendish, or cosmic power. They learn invocations and pact magic fueled by those bargains.

name: Wizard
summary: A learned arcane scholar wielding spells recorded in a spellbook.
description: Wizards study the structure of magic through rigorous research. Their spellbooks contain the formulae that allow them to bend reality.
